name: Clickure Challenge
description:
Fairys are strange creatures, they have healing powers since they born, but they must train hard and practice them to become real fairys and be able to heal anyone in danger and save this dangerous and temible world.

Here you will check for yourself the last challenge that a fairy must accomplish to become a real fairy, the "Cure Challenge", where a fairy has to keep his guardian as time alive as possible, but at the end, the guardian always die. You will only become a real fairy if you keep it alive for a minimum amount of time (maybe there is a hint on the Game Over screen about the amount of time required ^^).

Game intro:

Buy items:

Equip items:

Survive the horde:

Delay your end as much as you can! :)
